name: NodeJS Web Development
title: Best Nodejs Web Development Course in Delhi | Coding Blocks India

metas.name: description
metas.content: Learn FullStack Web Development with NodeJS in Delhi by best FullStack Web Development course in Delhi at Coding Blocks.

openGraph.title: Best Web Development with NodeJS in India
openGraph.description: Web Development course is designed to help students develop professional websites/portals. This course will help students understand how the web engine works.

courseMeta.title: Master FullStack Web with NodeJS
courseMeta.description: Learn building servers with NodeJS including MySQL, MongoDB, OAuth and WebSockets

aboutMentor.name: Sabeel Khan
aboutMentor.summary: Sabeel is a CS Graduate from JMI.A competitive programmar, with an undying passion for teaching.He is proficient with C++ and Web Development related technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript,NodeJS along with Python development.Web Series lover and always ready to explore new appetizing food.

studentsSay.name: Anshul Mittal
studentsSay.story: Coding Blocks helped in gaining enough experience to get internships at giants like Google and Rubrik.

studentsSay.name: Sidharth Bansal
studentsSay.story: Hii I am Sidharth Bansal from Delhi technology university. I have done competitive boot camp from coding blocks. This gave me a great exposure to problem solving mindset.

studentsSay.name: Samarth Jain
studentsSay.story: My journey in the world of Competitive Programming started with the Bootcamp at Coding Blocks, which turned out to be a changing point in my life. The immense amount of knowledge I got during the course did not only develop my interest but also made me pursue this field later. A special thanks to Shubham bhaiya, Mayank bhaiya and Prateek bhaiya for being the guiding lights in my journey and always motivating us to follow our passion!

highlights.head: Opportunities unlocked for learner
highlights.description: Students will develop various necessary skills to build professional websites/portals.Will get comfortable with JavaScript for both Frontend as well as Backend use-cases.Will be able to Build website from scratch and develop professional thinking ability.Will be able to build projects with backend in NodeJS.

highlights.head: Hands on Projects and Problems:
highlights.description: ToDoList App - A task manager with features like 'mark as done', 'clear done tasks' and sorting tasks by their status.Shopping Cart- Build E-Commerce Website using ExpressJS, PostgreSQL and jQuery.Chat App -Realtime Chat Room using Socket.IO

highlights.head: Why choose CB Live:
highlights.description: Two-Way Interaction: Share screen with your mentor for any doubt resolution 24*7.Placement Support: From Interview recommendations to placement, we are there for you at every step.Get into Bigwigs: Our expert will help you crack interviews for Amazon, Microsoft, Apple, Google, and Facebook.

highlights.head: This course is essential for you:
highlights.description: Who has Basic Knowledge of Programming concepts.Who wants to step up as a Developer from a programmer.Who wants to work at product-based companies like Facebook, Amazon, Uber, etc.

schedule.description: HTML - I: Text, List, Table, Media Tags
HTML - II and CSS - I: Forms, Tables, Frames, Stylesheets, selectors
CSS - II: Combinators, pseudo classes, Box Model
CSS - III: Flexboxes, Media Queries, Responsive Design
CSS - IV: Grids + Flexboxes Layouts
Bootstrap
JS Basics: variables, functions, classes, objects
Intro to JS-1: Functions, Scopes, Hoisting, Closures etc
Intro to JS-2: Async Functions, Prototypes, Classes
Advanced JS-1: Event loop,Promises, async-await
Advanced JS-2: Understanding to DOM and BOM using JS
Project: Game using JS
Learn AJAX requests and API creation
Learn Version Control System(Git and GitHub)
NodeJS: Introduction to NodeJs, dependency graph, file handling
ExpressJS-1: CRUD Operations and Creating Web-Server
ExpressJS-2: Server and Client Side Rendering
ExpressJS-3: Understanding Rest APIs
Database-1: Express JS with SQL and Sequelize-ORM
Database-2: MongoDB and Moongoose-ODM
Mongoose working with express
Sequelize Advanced, Relationships, REST API with DB
E-Commerce Site Project and Middlewares
E-Commerce Site- 2: Adding more features
Sessions, Cookies, User Management
User Authentication: PassportJS, 3rd party logins
Shopping Cart : Refactoring Product Controller and Star Rating
Unit Testing, Coverage, Mocha, Chai
Deployment to Heroku
Sockets: Create Chatting Application
Introduction to ReactJS-1
Introduction to ReactJS-2
